sentences.sContent: I looked out for you as a nightingale looks out for the cherry garden, - sighed the sixth.
sentences.sContent_eng: I looked out for you as a nightingale looks out for the cherry garden, - sighed the sixth.
sentences.sCn: 第六个女儿喊道：“我就像夜莺盼望着樱花园一样，整天张望着您。”

phrases.pCn: 弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔（英国护士）

trans.tranOther: a small bird that sings very beautifully, especially at night
